content:
IOperationStream Interface

Definition

Represents a stream of replication or copy operations that are sent from the Primary to the Secondary replica.

In this Article

public interface IOperationStream

Remarks

The streams returned from and
are objects that implement .

Methods

GetOperationAsync(CancellationToken)

Gets the next object that implements IOperation from the underlying IOperationStream.
